news.body: MAGI was highlighted in News from Brown, including a short video highlighting MAGI key features.
Our paper introducing the MAGI web application was just published in Nature Methods.
Check out our HotNet2 Pan-Cancer paper, recently published in Nature Genetics.
Presented a poster at the first bi-annual CSHL Biological Data Science meeting.
Attended the Heidelberg Laureate Forum, along with two other students from Brown. We brought the Brown CS rubber chicken.
Presented Multi-Dendrix as a highlight talk at ISMB 2014, where Brown CS and CCMB enjoyed record participation.
Presented posters on MAGI and HotNet2 at the TCGA Scientific Symposium.
Presented a poster on Dendrix++ and Multi-Dendrix at the 2013 Computational Aspects of Biological Information (CABI) workshop at MSR New England.
Check out our review of network methods for GWAS data, recently published in Current Opinion in Genetics & Development.
Presented a poster on HotNet analysis of TCGA Pan-Cancer data at the Cold Spring Harbor Biology of Genomes meeting.
Check out our paper describing the Multi-Dendrix algorithm with applications to glioblastoma and breast cancer data, recently published in PLoS Computational Biology.
Presented a poster on HotNet analysis of TCGA Pan-Cancer data at RECOMB 2013 in Beijing.
Presented a poster on the Dendrix++ and Multi-Dendrix algorithms at the Beyond the Genomes conference in Boston.
